Description: Bid and Buy with confidence from Prescott Valley Music, AZ. Vintage 60's Hagstrom III Guitar This is a Great looking -- Great sounding and super fun guitar to play We have 10's on it now, and the tremolo works great and stays in tune It has a little fret wear (mostly on the lower end) but it doesn't buzz It plays cleanly with super low action ! The controls, switches and the 1) Vol pot has been cleaned and all work good Everything works and sounds great ! The 3 original pickups sound and work great There is a tremendous variety of tones you can get from this guitar ! It's loud and it has a sound all it's own ! There's just a few issues with this guitar -- Most all cosmetic The body has been re-finished red The neck has been painted black The Pickup On / Off switch is wired (or installed) backwardsSo "On" is actually "Off" and vice versa It's missing 2) pearl dot inlays (15th and 17th fret markers) The nut has been replaced, but it works great The Volume Knob works, but it's broken it wobbles a little if you man handle it but it stays on and it works. These issues are not a big deal ! It plays and sounds great just like it is ! After all -- It's a 54 year old Hag ! Vintage Hagstrom III THIS GUITAR IS PROFESSIONALLY SETUP PLAYS AND SOUNDS GREATVINTAGE HAGSTROM III PV MUSIC GUITAR SHOP INSPECTED PRO DETAILED AND SETUP WITH NEW GHS .010's AND TESTED This guitar will arrive "as described" professionally setup and ready to play right out of the box.It's had a complete detailing ---- It's a great playing "HAGSTROM III" We take many pictures - Please see them all below.
